price: 38. Kaadu sinni Rabbih seeco oggoleeh, salat soolise maray sinni caagid sinni fanal malah-leeh, Nanu keenih neceemik tu yacee mara kinnon.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَجَابُواْ لِرَبِّهِمۡ وَأَقَامُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَأَمۡرُهُمۡ شُورَىٰ بَيۡنَهُمۡ وَمِمَّا رَزَقۡنَٰهُمۡ يُنفِقُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna is'tajābū lirabbihim wa-aqāmū al-ṣalata wa-amruhum shūrā baynahum wamimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūna
